labspaces.name: labspace-agentic-apps-with-docker
labspaces.title: Building agentic apps with Docker
labspaces.description: Get up and going with building agentic applications with Compose, Docker Model Runner, and the Docker MCP Gateway.

labspaces.name: labspace-mcp-gateway
labspaces.title: Using MCP Servers with the MCP Gateway
labspaces.description: Learn how to use the Docker MCP Gateway to provide your agentic applications with the tools they need to perform complex tasks.

labspaces.name: labspace-fine-tuning
labspaces.title: Fine-tuning models with Docker Offload and Unsloth
labspaces.description: Learn how to fine-tune lightweight LLMs to meet your application's needs

labspaces.name: labspace-container-supported-development
labspaces.title: Container-supported development
labspaces.description: Run databases, debug tools, and more across your entire team with minimal setup.

labspaces.name: labspace-building-secure-images
labspaces.title: Building secure container images
labspaces.description: Learn to build better and more secure container images with Docker Scout

labspaces.name: labspace-dhi-node
labspaces.title: Docker DHI - Node
labspaces.description: Convert a Node.js application to use Docker Hardened Images (DHI) and see the improved security results.
